metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14139 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
ImageMagick 7.0.6-2 has a memory leak vulnerability in WriteMSLImage in coders/msl.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14139` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
imagemagick-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
libmagick++-6.q16-7 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-7 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
libmagickcore-6.q16-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
libmagickcore-6.q16-3-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-3-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
libmagickwand-6.q16-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
perlmagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 0139* to 0141* in bionic not fixing memory leak in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6').
